reviews.review_msg: AMAZING, KNOWLEDGEABLE, EXPERIENCED AND ACTIVE IN LOCAL, NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL ART COMMUNITY, EXTREMELY SUPPORTIVE, CARING, UNSELFISH, UNDENIABLY PASSIONATE OF CONTEMPORARY ART AND CULTURE.  SHE IS SYMPATHETIC, ALWAYS THINKING OF OTHERS, MOTIVATING, AND PARTIES LIKE A ROCKSTAR! I LOVE ALLYSON!
